text: faman yasha allah 'an yuafiqah lqabwl alhaqi yashrah sadrah liltawhid wal'iimana, waman yasha 'an yudilah yajeal sadrah fi hal shadidat min alanqibad ean qabwl alhudaa, kuhal man yasead fi tabaqat aljawi aleulya, fisab bidiq shadid fi altanfus. wakama yajeal allah sudur alkafirin shadidat aldiyq walanqibadi, kdhlk yajeal aleadhab ealaa aladhin la yuminun biha
